0.1.name: wordpress/point-and-stare-category-authors-widget
0.1.description:
This plugin adds a widget that displays authors who have contributed to the current category and links to their profile page.

If you find this plug-in just so totally awesome that you develop a massive urge to donate, feel free to donate here: http://wordpressfoundation.org/donate/

All and any feedback - post it on the forum or email wordpress@pointandstare.com
